name: DropDetect
description: Use tfjs to predict dropshipping sites in a chrome extension (v3)

scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/src && mkdir -p dist/models &&cp src/content.js dist/src/ && cp -r models/ dist/models
scripts.build: parcel build src/service_worker.js --dist-dir dist/src/ && npm run copy
scripts.watch: npm run copy && parcel watch src/service_worker.js --dist-dir dist/src/
